pillars.desc1: Cut weeks off your go-live schedule. Decisions are defined once and executed without reinterpretation.
pillars.desc2: Upgrade brownfield warehouses without 'Big Bang' risks. Integrate new zones while old ones keep running.
pillars.desc3: Don't fly blind. Digital Twin improves stakeholder alignment and validation.
pillars.desc4: Pay only for what you need. LogisQ-WES adapts to your process, not the other way around.
pillars.desc5: Built on the industrial ArconQ platform. Database-independent and scalable for the next 15 years.

trust.title: Software with Real Warehouse DNA
trust.description: LogisQ-WES is owned and developed by BSS LogisQ, a joint venture that combines general contractor expertise with mission-critical software excellence.
trust.bssDesc: A leading general contractor for warehouse automation, delivering complex greenfield and brownfield projects worldwide.
trust.macrixDesc: Creators of the ArconQ industrial platform – in productive use since 2010 with over 100 successful automation projects.
trust.footer: This combination ensures that LogisQ-WES is built for real-world constraints, not theoretical system landscapes.

products.title: Buy Exactly What You Need
products.subtitle: LogisQ-WES is not an all-or-nothing system. Deploy modular components standalone or combined.
products.wmsDesc: The business-level logic for your warehouse. Orchestrate orders, inventory, and resource allocation with precision.
products.mfcDesc: Real-time orchestration of automated systems, conveyors, and AS/RS. Reliable control at maximum throughput.
products.fleetDesc: Vendor-independent management of AGVs and AMRs. Coordinate mixed fleets through a single, unified interface.

cta.title: Ready to Orchestrate Your Warehouse?
cta.subtitle: Get in touch with our experts to discuss your brownfield upgrade or greenfield automation project.

solutionsPage.title: Orchestrating Complex Logistics
solutionsPage.subtitle: Discover how LogisQ-WES combines modular architecture with digital twin transparency to shorten project runtimes and secure your investment.
solutionsPage.intro: Our solutions are designed for the reality of modern warehouses: hybrid, modular, and constantly evolving.

card1.title: Modular WES Architecture
card1.desc: The end of monolithic constraints. Deploy exactly the modules you need for WMS, MFC, or Fleet Management.

card2.title: Digital Twin & Transparency
card2.desc: Real-time 3D orchestration of your warehouse flows. Control complexity through visual trust.

card3.title: Brownfield & Retrofit
card3.desc: Integrate before you replace. Modernize existing automation step-by-step without big-bang risks.

card4.title: Fleet Management
card4.desc: Unified coordination of AGVs and AMRs. Vendor-independent orchestration of your mobile robot fleet.

digitalTwinPage.title: Full Control Through Digital Twin
digitalTwinPage.subtitle: Real-time 3D orchestration of your warehouse flows for total operational transparency.
digitalTwinPage.intro: The LogisQ Digital Twin is more than a visualization. It is your trust anchor, providing a clear understanding of complex automation in real time.

features.f1Desc: See exactly what is happening in your warehouse. 2D and 3D views of every move, shuttle, and picker.
features.f2Desc: Identify bottlenecks and optimize flows through visual intuition rather than complex data tables.
features.f3Desc: Strong visual communication for operators and stakeholders. Transparency that leads to better decision-making.

digitalTwinPage.roadmapDesc: Advanced simulation and 'what-if' scenarios are part of our strategic roadmap. We build the visual foundation for predictive logistics today.

brownfieldPage.title: Upgrade Your Warehouse — Without Starting from Scratch
brownfieldPage.subtitle: Modernize existing automation step-by-step with zero architectural dead ends.
brownfieldPage.intro: Most warehouses are brownfield installations. LogisQ-WES is designed for mixed automation, legacy integration, and gradual modernization.

blocks.b1Desc: Your existing WMS, PLCs, and mechanical systems remain operational. We integrate them into a unified orchestration layer.
blocks.b2Desc: Coordinate manual areas, existing shuttles, and new AGVs through one system. No vendor lock-in.
blocks.b3Desc: Avoid the big-bang risk. Modernize specific zones or modules at your own pace.
blocks.b4Desc: Visualize your current state and simulate future changes before implementation to minimize operational downtime.

modularWesPage.title: LogisQ Product Overview
modularWesPage.subtitle: A unified product architecture composed of specialized, independent modules.
modularWesPage.intro: LogisQ-WES is the overarching product that orchestrates the entire warehouse. It combines the 'Brain' (WMS), the 'Engine' (PER), and the 'Muscles' (MFC) into a single, cohesive system.

productStructure.title: The LogisQ-WES Product
productStructure.desc: Unlike monolithic legacy systems, LogisQ-WES is built as a suite of strictly separated modules communicating via a central Hub. This ensures you can upgrade the WMS without touching the MFC, or swap Fleet Managers without rewriting the WES.

comparison.title: WMS vs. WCS vs. LogisQ-WES
comparison.desc: Why do you need a WES? Because modern warehouses need more than just inventory management (WMS) or machine control (WCS). They need real-time execution.

pillars.p1Desc: Modules communicate via the CommunicationHub using standardized events. No hard-coded dependencies between layers.
pillars.p2Desc: Upgrade your WMS logic without risking your PLC connections. Patch the MFC without taking down the Order Management.
pillars.p3Desc: Because modules are independent, we can deploy LogisQ-WES alongside your existing legacy WMS to handle just the automation islands.

modularWesPage.techDesc: Built on the industrial ArconQ platform, ensuring 24/7 reliability, traceablity, and secure integration standards.

technologyPage.title: LogisQ-WES Architecture
technologyPage.subtitle: A manifest-driven, workflow-first execution runtime. Built for determinism and safety.
technologyPage.intro: The LogisQ architecture strictly focuses on separation of concerns. The WMS owns the 'What and Why', the PER owns the 'How', and the MFC owns the 'Now'.

layers.name: Warehouse Management / WMS
layers.desc: Owns business state (Orders, Inventory). Authorizes intents via Policy Checks. Never executes physical moves directly.

layers.name: Process Execution / PER
layers.desc: Elsa-based Workflow Engine. Stateless, domain-agnostic. Orchestrates capabilities based on Runtime Manifests.

layers.name: Material Flow / MFC
layers.desc: Real-time telegram handling (PLC/TCP). Owns the Transport Graph and high-speed routing decisions.

layers.name: Connectivity / CommunicationHub
layers.desc: The Universal Gateway. Connects LogisQ to the outer world: ERP, PLCs, production machines, legacy systems, and external modules.

layers.name: Fleet Management / SquadronQ
layers.desc: Autonomous fleet manager connected via The Gateway. Treated as an external system to ensure it can be sold and operated independently.

layers.name: Infrastructure / ArconQ
layers.desc: Provides the underlying Audit Log, Identity Management, and Event Bus (RabbitMQ/Kafka) ensuring 24/7 reliability.

model.title: Manifest-Driven Execution
model.desc: We do not code hard processes. We define 'Runtime Manifests' (JSON) that bind abstract Capabilities to concrete Blueprints. This allows us to change strategies without recompiling the core.

security.title: Safety & Authorization
security.desc: Execution is secured by 'ProcessScope'. A running workflow only has access to the specific resources (Intents) granted by the WMS at start time. No unauthorized side-effects are possible.

fleetPage.title: Vendor-Independent Fleet Orchestration
fleetPage.subtitle: Coordinate mixed fleets of AGVs and AMRs through a single, unified interface with SquadronQ.
fleetPage.intro: Modern logistics depends on mobility. We break down vendor silos by providing a centralized control layer for your entire robot fleet.

features.f1Desc: No more managing different vendors in different apps. SquadronQ orchestrates robots from multiple manufacturers seamlessly.
features.f2Desc: Real-time path planning and collision avoidance across your entire automated fleet to ensure maximum throughput.
features.f3Desc: Automated charging cycles and intelligent task assignment based on robot state, location, and priority.

contactPage.title: Get in Touch
contactPage.subtitle: Ready to modernize your warehouse? Don't let outdated systems slow you down.
contactPage.highlight: Meet the team that will take control of your operations.

hero.description: Through end-to-end design instead of reinterpretation between planning and operation.

meta.title: Warehouse Execution System for Automated Logistics | BSS LogisQ
meta.description: Modular Warehouse Execution System for fully automated and goods-to-person warehouses. Shorter project runtimes, Digital Twin, no vendor lock-in.
